block.p: Elizabeth Scott Lavine and Peter Stephen Russell are to be married this evening by the Rev. Dr. Pamela D. Blair, an interfaith minister, at the New York Botanical Garden in the Bronx.

The bride, 28, graduated from the University of Vermont and is studying for a master's degree in elementary education at Fordham. She is a daughter of David S. Lavine of Easton, Conn., and Serena Smith of Fairfield, Conn., and a stepdaughter of Jill Shellow-Lavine and of the late Daniel B. Smith.
Elizabeth Scott Lavine and Peter Stephen Russell are to be married this evening by the Rev. Dr. Pamela D. Blair, an interfaith minister, at the New York Botanical Garden in the Bronx.

The bride, 28, graduated from the University of Vermont and is studying for a master's degree in elementary education at Fordham. She is a daughter of David S. Lavine of Easton, Conn., and Serena Smith of Fairfield, Conn., and a stepdaughter of Jill Shellow-Lavine and of the late Daniel B. Smith.

The bridegroom, also 28, is the distribution manager for Reader's Digest Young Families, a children's book subsidiary of the Reader's Digest Association in Pleasantville, N.Y. He graduated from Kenyon College and is a son of Lynn and Edward W. Russell III of Pleasantville.
